1170180.overview: Upcoming sequel to "Volicia of Pluto - Chapter One: Fire of the Apocalypse".
1170180.title: Volicia of Pluto - Chapter 2: Ultramarine

1244492.overview: The overly confident Fujino and the shut-in Kyomoto couldn't be more different, but a love of drawing manga brings these two small-town girls together.
1244492.title: Look Back

1211716.overview: The second part of a spin-off of YuruYuri featuring Sakurako and her sisters.
1211716.title: Ōmuro-ke dear friends

1223178.original_title: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー 新時代の扉
1223178.overview: The film follows Jungle Pocket, who wishes to participate in the Triple Crown Classic race, which can only be run once in a lifetime. She faces rivals Agnes Tachyon and Manhattan Cafe.
1223178.title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Beginning of a New Era

1216623.overview: Yū Higashi, a high school girl, aims to be an idol. To achieve her dream, she sets four rules for herself: she will not be active on social media, she will not have a boyfriend, she will not stand out in school, and she will make friends with beautiful girls from the north, south, east, and west.
1216623.title: Trapezium

1172229.original_title: デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション 前編
1172229.overview: A large spaceship appears over Tokyo three years before the story starts. A one-sided war against the seemingly harmless aliens ensues, sparking controversy and pacifism. Despite this unique and tragic event, high school girls Koyama Kadode and Nakagawa Ouran behave as if nothing has changed. They live their days like they always have. The focus of this story is not the alien invasion, but human nature, dialogue, growing up, and life.
1172229.title: Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction Part 2

1104844.original_title: 劇場版ブルーロック -EPISODE 凪-
1104844.overview: Spin-off centered on the character of Seishirou Nagi before he enters Blue Lock.
1104844.title: BLUELOCK: Episode Nagi

1250784.overview: In the coal mining town crowded with small-scale miners, known as the "Hakoniwa", there is a girl named Kagari who runs a map shop, and her childhood friend Yuya, who dreams of breaking free from the "Hakoniwa" and the ever-changing labyrinth-like tow. Lately, suspicious "sinkhole accidents" occurring frequently in the town begin to encroach on their daily lives. Will Kagari be able to overcome this situation and determine the fate of the town? Beyond the challenges, the girl will grow up a bit today.
1250784.title: Kuramerukagari

1209217.original_title: 名探偵コナン 100万ドルの五稜星（みちしるべ）
1209217.title: Detective Conan: One Million Dollar Five-Pointed Star

1213932.original_title: Hololive 5th Fes - Capture the Moment Day 1 Stage 2
1213932.overview: “Capture the Moment”  Savor it.  Treasure it.  Continued growth since 1st fes.  Cherished memories. Emotions.  A future that is built to last.  And this moment is no less precious.  Treasure every moment, most importantly this very one. Here, now.  In staying true to those ideals, hololive 5th fes. will take place on a three-sided stage – an unprecedented and monumental first for hololive production!  Connecting past, present, and future, we aim to hold a performance the likes of which have never before been seen.
1213932.title: Hololive 5tIh Fes - Capture the Moment Day 1 Stage 2

In staying true to those ideals, hololive 5th fes. will take place on a three-sided stage – an unprecedented and monumental first for hololive production! 1213925.title: Hololive 5tIh Fes - Capture the Moment Day 1 Stage 1

1211650.title: Ya Boy Kongming! Road to Summer Sonia

1148677.original_title: 映画ドラえもん のび太の地球交響楽
1148677.overview: Music exists in our daily lives for granted. But what would happen if music disappeared from the earth? This is a completely original story about Doraemon and his friends who are trying to save the earth from a crisis with the familiar theme of music!
1148677.title: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's Earth Symphony
